edu.gvsu.kurmasz.zawilinski

Class TextSizePrefilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xml.sax.helpers.XMLFilterImpl
      • edu.gvsu.kurmasz.zawilinski.TextPrefilter
        • edu.gvsu.kurmasz.zawilinski.TextSizePrefilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ContentHandler, DTDHandler, EntityResolver, ErrorHandler, XMLFilter, XMLReader

    public class TextSizePrefilter
extends TextPrefilter
    A TextPrefilter that limits the number of characters allowed in a given MediaWiki <text> element.
    Author:
    Zachary Kurmas
